question: The office you work in does not have any cafeteria for staff. Write a letter to your manager to request setting up a cafeteria for the staff.In your letter, you should tell,what you heard about the inconvenience from the staffhow you feel about itwhat suggestions you have about setting up a cafeteria
text: Hope I did not catch you in a busy time. I know that you have so many other important priorities at work. But the issue I want to raise here is the equality for our staff.

The reason for which I am writing this letter is that our office does not have any cafeteria for staff. where they can enjoy their snacks and drinks. most of the staff members go outside for meal and it takes 10 to 15 minutes and that time is wasting our work time too. Sometimes the weather is not friendly so you understand the whole situation here.

Therefore, I would like to request you to set up a cafeteria in the empty room. The room is located in a  corner near to office and I noticed we did not use that room for a while. so in this ,way our staff did not go outside.
I hope you consider this issue and arrange a cafeteria soon, thank you in advance.
